headline: Trump signs stablecoin bill into law, capping string of 'Crypto Week' victories
summary: President Trump signed into law a bill that establishes the first federal framework for dollar-backed stablecoins, a major victory for an industry that has pushed for more favorable oversight in Washington, D.C.

raw.headline: Trump signs stablecoin bill into law, capping string of 'Crypto Week' victories
raw.summary: President Trump signed into law a bill that establishes the first federal framework for dollar-backed stablecoins, a major victory for an industry that has pushed for more favorable oversight in Washington, D.C.

headline: Regions Financial Q2 Earnings Beat on Solid NII & Fee Income, Stock Up
summary: RF beats Q2 EPS estimates on strong NII and fee income growth; shares climb 5.1% in early market as profits and capital improve.
